page.title: 10Leisure Time.
page.content: It was very difficult trying to get accurate statistics from a class of four to five year old boys and girls.We discussed the kinds of activities they take part in under these three headings:-Inside the home.Outside the home.In the playground.There are eighteen children involved. In the playground.Running races,catching games,hopscotch,playing with toy cars or similar small toys.These CAR games often took the identity from a television programme,for example Knight Rider and Street Hawk.Mums and Dads,I sent a letter,the children also made up their own games.. I sent a letter. Children stand in a circle.One child drops an object another child tries to catch the first.
